_xResult.title: Out for Summer Midi Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Lovely custom made linen dress for work or play
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made linen dress is highly textured and structured in quality linen fabric, and comes in many colors. It's one of Aiste of Lithuania's signature patterns and you will never stop loving the compliments you get wearing it. Choose almost any color, and Aiste can customize it for you. Wear alone or choose a matching or contrasting jacket from the Aiste line of amazing separates.

 

Scoop neck front, standup collar in back, 3/4 sleeves, asymmetrical hem. If you wish to make changes to the sleeve or skirt length, please indicate in Instructions.

 

Aiste says "The wholesomeness of the landscape and the vast expanse of nature that surround me is my inspiration. The geometric patterns of the tree trunks in the forest, the rise and fall of the waves in the sea, the colors of the passing seasons: all these elements come together when I produce my hand-sewn fabrics. I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing is needed before you wear this garment.  With Love, Aiste"

 

Did you know? Linen naturally repels dirt! So you have to wash it less often. The planet will thank you!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold, dry flat. Dry clean ok.
